Package ohos.agp.components

Class ComponentTreeObserver

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.components.ComponentTreeObserver

  • public final class ComponentTreeObserver
extends Object
    Defines listeners for the component hierarchy.

    You can register listeners to monitor global changes in the component hierarchy.

    Since:
    3

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static interface  ComponentTreeObserver.GlobalFocusUpdatedListener
      Callback to be invoked when the focus state within the component tree changes.
      static interface  ComponentTreeObserver.GlobalLayoutListener
      Deprecated. 
      use Component.LayoutRefreshedListener instead
      static interface  ComponentTreeObserver.ScrollChangedListener
      Callback to be invoked when any element in the component hierarchy has been scrolled.
      static interface  ComponentTreeObserver.WindowBoundListener
      Callback to be invoked when the component hierarchy is bound to or unbound from its window.
      static interface  ComponentTreeObserver.WindowFocusUpdatedListener
      Callback to be invoked when the window focus state changes in the component hierarchy.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addGlobalFocusUpdatedListener​(ComponentTreeObserver.GlobalFocusUpdatedListener listener)
      Registers a listener for globalFocusChanged().
      void addScrolledListener​(ComponentTreeObserver.ScrollChangedListener listener)
      Registers a listener for scrollChanged().

      Deprecated. 
      use Component#setLayoutRefreshedListener(Component.LayoutRefreshedListener) instead
      void addWindowBoundListener​(ComponentTreeObserver.WindowBoundListener listener)
      Registers a listener for windowBound().
      void addWindowFocusUpdatedListener​(ComponentTreeObserver.WindowFocusUpdatedListener listener)
      Registers a listener for windowFocusUpdated().
      void removeGlobalFocusUpdatedListener​(ComponentTreeObserver.GlobalFocusUpdatedListener listener)
      Removes a listener registered for globalFocusChanged().
      void removeScrolledListener​(ComponentTreeObserver.ScrollChangedListener listener)
      Removes a listener registered for scrollChanged().
      void removeTreeLayoutChangedListener​(ComponentTreeObserver.GlobalLayoutListener listener)
      Deprecated. 
      use Component#setLayoutRefreshedListener(Component.LayoutRefreshedListener) with the null listener value instead
      void removeWindowBoundListener​(ComponentTreeObserver.WindowBoundListener listener)
      Removes a listener registered for windowAttached().
      void removeWindowFocusUpdatedListener​(ComponentTreeObserver.WindowFocusUpdatedListener listener)
      Removes a listener registered for windowFocusUpdated().
